Activity: Log in to the system and check emails. Review any pending help desk tickets from the weekend.
Research and evaluate potential help desk ticketing systems suitable for EHR-related issues. Take notes on features and pricing.
Send an email to @itpm-1 and @ehrv-1 to discuss the requirements and budget for the ticketing system.
Take a short break and browse creative websites for inspiration on user-friendly interfaces.
Draft a proposal for the help desk ticketing system, including potential channels for user support (email, phone, chat).
Review the draft proposal and refine it based on initial feedback from the morning.
Set up a test environment for one of the ticketing systems to evaluate its functionality.
Document findings from the test environment and prepare a summary for the team.
Wrap up the day by organizing notes and sending a follow-up email to @itpm-1 about the progress.
